entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
